title: alertoriole
author: alertoriole
created_time: November 08, 2022, 06:18:58 AMLast edit: February 20, 2023, 05:02:59 PM by alertoriole
content: Hi, probably very unlikely to get any traction here as it seems to just be a bunch of people arguing. I am a large p2p seller and trade in cash for usdt and btc around europe and latin america, mostly mexico and colombia. If you have a history on p2p I would entertain table top deals.Generally speaking these trades would be for 50k and above. Canada is also an option, specifically toronto.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: It's good to say that you're running a service but this is most probably suit currency exchange board[1]. You can move this thread, controls are in the lower left of this thread "move topic".[1] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=53.0

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: I assume you could prove the LocalBitcoins account is yours if people asked you to, right? I am only asking about that one since it's been around for over 5 years and your account on LocalCoinSwap is relatively new.How does this work exactly? Are you and your team travelling the world wherever a deal needs to be made, or do both parties have to meet in one of a few locations you operate out of? What I am asking is could I ask your team to deal with me in Zagreb, for example, and someone would be there to meet me, or do I have to come to you?
